attributes.action: require East Sussex County Council to reduce the current 40 mph speed limit on Willingdon Road, Eastbourne to 30 mph south of the Willingdon roundabout, as recommended by Sussex Police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sussex Police have recommended in the injury accident report by Phillip Mititelu-Henderson PC CM580, concerning two pupils of Ratton school, that the speed limit south of the Willingdon roundabout should be reduced from 40 mph to 30 mph.
